Class AppController

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.application.Application

extends javafx.application.Application

      • checkAccess

        public boolean checkAccess​(java.lang.String username,
                           java.lang.String password,
                           boolean newUser)
        checkAccess method checks username and password and performs a login if they are correct.
        Parameters:
        username - player username.
        password - player password.
        newUser - if the user is new or not. True = new. False = old.
        Returns:
        true if login is completes without failure. False if login fails.

        public java.util.ArrayList<Lobby> findLobbies​(boolean prv)
        findLobbies method let's you see the available lobbies.
        Parameters:
        prv - If the lobby is private or not. True = private. False = public.
        Returns:
        an ArrayList over available lobbies.

      • updatePlayerList

        public void updatePlayerList​(boolean hasBecomeHost)
        updatePlayerList method updates the player list inside the lobby.
        Parameters:
        hasBecomeHost - if the player has become the host or not. True = now host. False = not host.

        endScheduledTask method resets the schedule object.

      • joinLobby

        public boolean joinLobby​(Lobby lobby,
                         boolean isHost)
        joinLobby method connects an user to a lobby.
        Parameters:
        lobby - Lobby object of the lobby the user wants to join
        isHost - if the host user is the host or not. True = is host. False = not host.
        Returns:
        true if connection success. False if connection failure.

        public boolean hasOrderChanged()
        hasOrderChanged method checks if the order of player have changed and updates the order if it has.
        Returns:
        true if order has changed. False if order hasn't changed.

      • removePlayer

        public void removePlayer​(int userID,
                         int order)
        removePlayer method removes a player if they timeout during the game.
        Parameters:
        userID - the user's ID
        order - in which order the player is in (player 1-4).
